articles.description: This is also an easy problem. Find it here. Here's my solution to the problem. class Solution: def isHappy(self, n: int) -> bool: new_n = n seen = set() while True: sums = 0 for i in str(new_n): sums += int(i) * int(i) new_n = sums if new_n == 1: return True if new_n in seen: return False else: seen.add(new_n) return False The time and space complexity is O(log n). Is there a better way to do this? Please let me know.
